component.name: Net Boost Analysis
component.author: Wiggins lab (C2B2)
component.description: NetBoost is an algorithm used to assess evolutionary mechanisms that may have given rise to an interaction network. Specifically, given a gene-gene interaction network T (like the one produced by ARACNE) NetBoost will examine a number of generative evolutionary models {M} and will attempt to assess which of these models is more probable to have generated the network T.
